INFO_SHORT.Title: A LITTLE ABOUT ALEX S&E COMPANY
INFO_SHORT.ContentTop:
The company began its activity in 1993 by producing the commercial scales,
batching counters and automated accounting systems for industrial and commercial enterprises.
INFO_SHORT.ContentBottom:
Nowadays Alex S&E is one of the largest engineering companies in Moldova and
the CIS countries. Production area and service center of the company is located on the
territory of more than 1300 square meters, and the number of employees exceeded 100 persons.

WHY.Title: WHY WE
WHY.Text:
The largest manufacturer and distributor of
weighing equipment for industry and trade in Moldova.

QUESTIONS.Title: Have questions?
QUESTIONS.Text: Leave a request to get a free consultation for your business.

MorePos.TitleOne: WHAT PC IS NECESSARY FOR THE ALEX MARKET SOFTWARE?
MorePos.TextOne: Any OS Windows desktop or laptop
MorePos.TitleTwo: IS IT POSSIBLE TO SUPPLEMENT THE SET?
MorePos.TextTwo: Of course, we will help you find all the necessary POS equipment (cash box, fiscal register, etc.)
MorePos.TitleThree: IS THE SOFTWARE INCLUDED IN THE PRICE?
MorePos.TextThree: Yes, the package price includes a full purchase of the software forever.
MorePos.TitleFour: CAN YOU HELP WITH INSTALLATION AND SETUP?
MorePos.TextFour: Yes we can. Contact us to discuss the possibility of installation in more detail.

Header.TitleTop: Professional system for automation of trade and accounting.
Header.TitleBottom: Each business is individual and therefore the approach to the choice of equipment and software is also different. Our experts will develop an individual solution that will work for the benefit of your business.

Advantage.Title: Benefits
Advantage.IconOne: Alex-Market is the ideal solution for retial
Advantage.IconThree: Only basic computer knowledge is required to work
Advantage.IconFour: Technical support from the software developer

Divert.Title: Feel free to ask us questions

Features.SpecTextOne: The simple interface of the software allows to register the sales in a few seconds, which provides fast service
Features.SpecTextTwo: Unlimited number of product characteristics fields: margin, arrival date, expiration date, minimum balance, etc.
Features.SpecTextThree: Convenient and accurate control of leftovers to track the current availability of products in the warehouse at any time and issue invoices
Features.SpecTextFour: Sales reports broken down by receipts, goods, discounts, etc. for any period. Reports on sales leaders / outsiders, seasonal demand fluctuations and others
Features.SpecTextFive: Sales reports broken down by receipts, goods, discounts, etc. for any period. Reports on sales leaders / outsiders, seasonal demand fluctuations and others
Features.SpecTextSix: Printing price tags and labels directly from the program, as well as by connecting to third-party software
Features.SpecTextSeven: Discount cards, accumulative, seasonal and temporary discounts for goods and categories. Sale on credit
Features.SpecTextEight: The software or accounting of goods in the store allows to track the warehouse stocks in real time, conduct inventories, settlements with suppliers

Complect.TitleBottom: POS-sets for trading and accounting - configured, tested, with the software installed
Complect.ComText: Budget option for conducting trade accounting in small retail shops and boutiques.
Complect.AliText: Budget option for conducting trade accounting in stores and outlets with scales.
Complect.MarkText: Option for conducting trade accounting in markets with scales

Header.Title: The largest manufacturer and distributor of weighing equipment for industry and trade in Moldova

TextRab.Title: Brief history of the company
TextRab.TextTop: The company began its activity in 1993 as the manufacture of commercial scales, batchers and automated accounting systems for industrial and commercial enterprises.
TextRab.TextBottom: Nowadays “Alex S&E” is one of the largest engineering companies in Moldova and the CIS countries. The production area and service center of the company are located on an area of more than 1300 square meters, and the number of employees exceeded 100 people.

MoreAb.IconOne: Analytical balances of a wide range
MoreAb.IconTwo: Production of vehicles (10t-60t) and wagon (100t-250t) scales
MoreAb.IconThree: Modernization of all types of scales from mechanical to electronic, including vehicle and wagon scales, with access to PC
MoreAb.IconFour: Production of platform scales from 1 kg to 5 tons
MoreAb.IconFive: Complex  automation of goods turnover and warehouse accounting in shops, supermarkets, cafes and bars
MoreAb.IconSix: Production of all types of straight and multi-component batchers, as well as the modernization of existing batchers from mechanical to electronic
MoreAb.IconSeven: Creation of APCS and local networks
MoreAb.IconEight: Automation of internal accounting for the movement of raw materials, semi-finished products and finished products through weight control

DivTwoAb.Title: Our best advertisement:
DivTwoAb.Text: Equipment that well-functioning and has trouble-free operation for our customers!

FinalAb.TextOne:
Thanks to the development of the network of representative offices and branches, the products of «Alex S&E» became known not only in Moldova, but also abroad.
The main office of the company is located in Chisinau. Two more branches operate in Moscow (Russia) and Kharkov (Ukraine).

During 27 years of activity, our clients have become enterprises of various industries, such as metallurgy, oil refining and gas, mining and processing, meat and dairy, as well as bakery, feed, oil extraction, tobacco ferment, breweries, ceramics, porcelain and glass factories, trade enterprises and transport network.

All products of the company are certified and entered in the State Registers of the Republic of Moldova, Belarus, Ukraine, Kazakhstan and the Russian Federation.
FinalAb.TextTwo:
„Alex S&E” engineers and programmers constantly follow the trends in the development of industry and trade in order to offer our customers weighing equipment that meets international standards. All specialists are regularly trained abroad.

The company has established the reliable partnerships with the best foreign manufacturers of metrological, weighing and measuring equipment, as well as components for the production of scales. We work with companies from Holland, Italy, France, Great Britain and Israel.

The main principles that we adhere to:
• strict observance of the interests of the Customer;
• use of components only from the best foreign manufacturers;
• warranty for all components, equipment and service for the entire lifetime.
